class.name: HEX
class.summary: Hex class handling color hex for R, G, and B. Alpha or transparency is not included or used.

interface.name: HEXInt
interface.summary:
HEX(int decValue):
RGB decimal value representing color.

interface.name: HEXColor
interface.summary:
HEX(Color clr):
HEX can except color object.

interface.name: HEXString
interface.summary:
HEX(string hex):
HEX can except color HEXv3 #C0C, HEXv6 #CC00CC, or HEXv8 #FFCC00CC.

method.name: ToColor
method.summary:
ToColor(optional bool ignoreAlpha):
> If ignoreAlpha is True, the color will return based on ToRgbHex property value.
If ignoreAlpha is False, the color will return based on ToArgbHex property value.

property.name: ToRgb
property.summary: ToRgb, decimal values created from the ToRgbHex property value.
property.returns:
(int)
Integer values related to the ToRgbHex property value.

property.name: ToArgb
property.summary: ToArgb, decimal values created from the ToArgbHex property value.
property.returns:
(int)
Integer values related to the ToArgbHex property value.

property.name: AHex
property.summary: AHex, Default: 'FF' - When string hex or decimal passed in, without Alpha, default will be set to 'FF'.

property.name: A
property.summary: A, Default: '255' - When string hex or decimal passed in, without Alpha, default will be set to '255'.
property.returns:
(byte)
> 0-255 byte value specific to Alpha/Transparency (AHex) string value.

property.name: RHex
property.summary: RHex, 2 byte hexidecimal value for Red.

property.name: R
property.returns:
(byte)
> 0-255 byte value specific to Red (RHex) string value.

property.name: GHex
property.summary: GHex, 2 byte hexidecimal value for Green.

property.name: G
property.returns:
(byte)
> 0-255 byte value specific to Green (GHex) string value.

property.name: BHex
property.summary: BHex, 2 byte hexidecimal value for Blue.

property.name: B
property.returns:
(byte)
> 0-255 byte value specific to Blue BHex value.

property.name: IsWebSafeColor
property.summary: IsWebSafeColor, evaluates if color is in the WebSafe216 and/or WebSafe16 color palette.
property.returns:
(bool)
True: Color is part of WebSafe216 and/or WebSafe16 color palette.
False: Is not in either palette.

property.name: IsWebSafe216Color
property.summary: IsWebSafe216Color, evaluates if color is in the WebSafe216 color palette.
property.returns:
(bool)
True: Color is part of WebSafe216 color palette.
False: Is not in the palette.

property.name: IsWebSafe16Color
property.summary: IsWebSafe16Color, evaluates if color is in the WebSafe16 color palette.
property.returns:
(bool)
True: Color is part of WebSafe16 color palette.
False: Is not in the palette.
